Invocation Name: being a jerk
des:
Here are a few ideas on how to be a real jerk with your friends, colleagues or else.

Warning, these are funny ideas but not meant to be done in real life! Not kid friendly, you wouldn't want to give them bad ideas!

Hope you will enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
